data.title: Crotone live score, schedule & player stats
data.meta_description: Crotone live score, fixtures, player ratings and statistics.
data.text:
Crotone live scores, players, season schedule and today’s results are available on Sofascore.

Crotone next match

Crotone will play the next match against Cavese on Sep 2, 2024, 6:45:00 PM UTC in Serie C, Girone C.

When the match starts, you will be able to follow Cavese vs Crotone live score, standings, minute by minute updated live results and match statistics.

We may have video highlights with goals and news for some Crotone matches, but only if they play their match in one of the most popular football leagues.

Crotone previous match

Crotone previous match was against Team Altamura in Serie C, Girone C, the match ended with result 2 - 0 (Crotone won the match).

Crotone fixtures tab is showing the last 100 football matches with statistics and win/draw/lose icons.

There are also all Crotone scheduled matches that they are going to play in the future.

Crotone performance and form graph is a Sofascore unique algorithm that we are generating from the team's last 10 matches, statistics, detailed analysis and our own knowledge.

This graph may help predict future Crotone matches.

Current Crotone players

Forward: Marco Tumminello, Aristidi Kolaj, Guido Gómez, Marco Spina, Raffaele Cantisani, Riccardo Stronati, Lorenzo Chiarella, Mario Aprea Midfielder: Luis Rojas, Dimitar Kostadinov, Thomas Schirò, Jurica Jurčec, Jonathan Silva, Mattia Vitale, Antonio Ranieri, Enrico Oviszach, Riccardo Costa, Andrea Gallo Defender: Daniel Leo, Andrea Rispoli, Maxime Giron, Vinicius, Riccardo Cargnelutti, Giovanni D'Aprile, Alessio Guerini, Davide Di Pasquale, Filippo Groppelli Goalkeeper: Andrea Sala, Francesco D'Alterio

The current Crotone roster, stats and player performance can be found on this page.

There are also statistics for each player in all competitions with all total played and started matches, minutes played, number of goals scored, number of cards and much more.

Crotone top scorers list is updated live during every match.

You can click on players from the roster above and see available personal information such as nationality, date of birth, height, preferred foot, position, player value, transfer history etc.
